policy_1.title: TERMS OF SERVICE
policy_1.title-outSide-1: This Terms of Service section sets forth the terms governing the services between InfiGate eSIM and the customer. By registering to purchase a travel eSIM from InfiGate, you agree that these Terms of Service constitute the complete agreement between you (the “Customer”) and InfiGate (hereinafter collectively referred to as “We” or the “Company”).
policy_1.title-outSide-2: PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING TERMS OF SERVICE CAREFULLY BEFORE CLICKING THE “PAY” BUTTON.
policy_1.content-1:
InfiGate provides Vietnam and international travel eSIM packages (hereinafter referred to as “eSIM”) to travelers, with the mission of helping you stay connected to the internet anytime and anywhere during your trip.

The eSIM is provided in the form of a QR code, not a physical SIM card. It is only compatible with devices that support eSIM and are unlocked.
policy_1.content-2:
The price of the eSIM varies depending on the country and the type of package you choose.

Prices are clearly listed on InfiGate’s website, along with detailed descriptions for each eSIM.
policy_1.content-3:
If there is a dispute regarding an invoice, you must send written notice to InfiGate at least 7 days before the invoice due date, specifying the disputed items and details for each item.

Any undisputed amount or amount confirmed by a court’s final decision must be accepted and paid to InfiGate within 7 working days, even if other disputed items are still unresolved. InfiGate will endeavor to resolve all disputes quickly and in good faith.
policy_1.content-4:
If, for any reason, you need to cancel your order, you may cancel before making payment or before the eSIM QR code is sent to your email without penalty.

Once the eSIM QR code has been sent to your email, InfiGate does not accept cancellations under any circumstances. InfiGate only issues refunds if the eSIM has a problem that InfiGate cannot help you resolve.

Refunds will be made via the same payment method used for the purchase (e.g., domestic card, international card, bank transfer). The refund process may take up to 7 working days. InfiGate will not cover any bank fees (if any) arising from the refund.
policy_1.content-5:
This agreement, along with the Privacy Policy, constitutes the entire agreement between you and InfiGate and supersedes any prior agreements or statements related to InfiGate. Failure to enforce any provision of this agreement will not be construed as a waiver of that provision or the right to enforce it.

Any waiver, amendment, or addition to this agreement will only be effective if made in writing and signed by both parties. This agreement is governed by the laws of Vietnam.
policy_1.content-6:
If you have any questions about our Terms of Service, please contact us via:

Hotline/WhatsApp: +84 989 145 663
Email: info@infigate.global

policy_2.title: PRIVACY POLICY
policy_2.title-outSide-1: We respect the privacy and confidentiality of all our customers’ information.
policy_2.title-outSide-2: By creating this Policy, InfiGate.vn commits to protecting the privacy of our users and customers, ensuring the security of the information they provide. By purchasing a travel eSIM from InfiGate, you agree to the terms in our Privacy Policy below.
policy_2.title-4: Individuals or Organizations with Access to the Information
policy_2.title-5: Address of the Entity Collecting and Managing the Information
policy_2.title-6: Methods and Tools for Users to Access and Edit Their Data
policy_2.title-7: Mechanism for Receiving and Resolving Consumer Complaints Related to the Misuse or Use of Personal Information Beyond the Notified Scope
policy_2.content-1:
We use personal information for various business purposes, such as:

  • Completing transactions and billing for products and services;
  • Fulfilling your requests for service or support; predicting and resolving potential issues with our products and services;
  • Developing and improving products and services;
  • Recommending additional products or services;
  • Making internal business decisions on current and future offers;
  • Providing personalized services and user experiences;
  • Protecting our rights and property;
  • Contacting you about other services offered by InfiGate.

Your information is kept completely confidential and will not be disclosed to third parties unless you give permission.
policy_2.content-2:
1. Personal Information
     We collect personal information when you place an order on our website:
  • Full name
  • Email address
  • Phone number
  • Address
  1. Non-Personally Identifiable Data Collected on This Website
    We collect and store non-personally identifiable information in our server logs, including but not limited to browser type, IP address, operating system, date and time of access, pages visited on the website, duration of website visits, and return visits to the site.

We also use Google Analytics, a service that records non-personally identifiable data such as browser type, operating system, date and time of access, referring sources, pages visited on this website, time spent on the website, destination after leaving the website, and return visits.

We aggregate this non-personally identifiable data to better understand how visitors use our website and to help manage, maintain, and report on the use of our site.

We may share this non-personally identifiable data with third parties solely for the limited purposes of reporting on our website usage or to comply with applicable laws.

We do not rent, sell, or share any non-personally identifiable data collected on this website with third parties, including Google, for marketing purposes such as remarketing.

  1. Financial Transactions
    Credit card transactions are processed through one of the major third-party credit card processing companies. All your information is encrypted and used only to complete the relevant transactions. Our database stores only the last four digits of your credit card number for verification and approval purposes.
  2. Cookies
    InfiGate.vn uses cookies to recognize our customers when they visit our website, allowing us to customize their experience. You may need to enable cookies in your browser to register. However, if you choose to disable cookies, you can still navigate the website. Cookies do not store any personal information. All information is kept strictly confidential and is never sold or shared outside the company.
  3. System Information
    InfiGate.vn reserves the right to collect and store information such as IP addresses, browser types, or operating systems. All such information is kept strictly confidential and is used solely for system administration purposes. This information helps diagnose problems, monitor traffic, and track website usage.
  4. Email
    InfiGate.vn uses email to notify our members or customers about eSIM QR codes, installation instructions, or when new services or features are added. Our email lists are kept confidential and are never sold or shared with third parties.

If you want, I can now merge this with all your previously provided sections into a single, professional Privacy Policy & Terms document in English, ready for your website, with a uniform tone and format. That would make it much more polished and clear for international readers.
policy_2.content-3: The customer’s personal data will be stored until a request for deletion is made. In all other cases, the customer’s personal information will be kept secure on InfiGate.vn’s servers.
policy_2.content-4:
• Within the company, there are dedicated departments responsible for customer care during the product usage process.
  • Affiliated programs, joint operations, or outsourced services for the purposes stated in Section 1, with personal information confidentiality requirements always applied.
  • Legal requirements: We may disclose personal information if required by law and such disclosure is reasonably necessary to comply with legal procedures.
  • Business transfer (if any): In the event of a merger or full/partial acquisition by another company, the buyer will have the right to access the information we store and maintain, including personal information.
policy_2.content-5:
• Business name: WELLZONE TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS JOINT STOCK COMPANY

  • Established and operating under Business Registration Certificate No. 0109310641 issued by the Business Registration Office – Hanoi Department of Planning and Investment, first issued on August 17, 2020.

  • Head office: 10th Floor, 83B Ly Thuong Kiet Street, Cua Nam Ward, Hanoi City.
policy_2.content-6:
If you have any requests regarding access to or editing of your provided personal information, you may:

  • Contact via Hotline/WhatsApp: +84989145663
  • Send an email to: info@infigate.global
policy_2.content-7:
At InfiGate, protecting our customers’ personal information is of utmost importance. You are assured that any information you provide to InfiGate will not be shared, sold, or rented to any third party. InfiGate commits to using your information only in the following cases:

  • Improving service quality for customers.
  • Resolving disputes and complaints.
  • When required by legal authorities.

InfiGate understands that protecting your personal information is also our responsibility. Therefore, in any case where you have questions or feedback related to InfiGate’s privacy policy, or if your personal information has been misused or used beyond the notified scope, please contact us via hotline +84989145663 or email info@infigate.global so we can address the matter and work directly with you.
policy_2.content-8:
This policy does not modify or change any existing agreements you have with InfiGate. If you use or register for our products, our Terms of Service and certain other terms may apply to your usage, purchases, or registrations.
 If this policy conflicts with any part of those terms and agreements, those terms and agreements will take precedence.
policy_2.content-9:
We may update this policy if there are significant changes to our operations, or if legal or regulatory requirements demand it. If we decide to use or disclose personal information in a way that differs materially from what is stated in this policy at the time of collection, we will notify you by sending an email to the address you provided or by posting a prominent notice on our websites.
You should review this policy regularly to stay informed of the latest updates and the effective date of any changes.

If you want, I can now merge all sections you’ve given me (3 to 9 plus the earlier ones on delivery, returns, and warranty) into a single polished English Privacy & Policy document so it’s ready to publish on your website. That way, it will be consistent in tone, format, and clarity.
policy_2.content-10:
Communications and transactions conducted via the Internet carry various security risks. In all cases, InfiGate shall not be liable for any damages or losses, whether direct or indirect, incidental or consequential, special or punitive, arising from or related to the unauthorized use, alteration, deletion, or disclosure of any information—confidential or otherwise—resulting from unauthorized system intrusion, any other security breach, or system failure.

InfiGate makes no warranties regarding the hardware and software used to provide security and support for this website, including all implied warranties, fitness for a particular purpose, and incidental, special, direct, or consequential damages.

Accordingly, InfiGate, its officers, employees, partners, affiliates, subsidiaries, successors, assigns, and third-party agents shall not be held directly or indirectly liable in any way to you or any other person for any inaccuracies, misuse, errors, third-party interference, viruses, or hacker attacks that result in data or service loss—including but not limited to transmission errors or service interruptions.

InfiGate may provide links to other websites. These links are provided solely for informational purposes and to help you locate other Internet resources. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of those websites.
policy_2.content-11:
By accessing this website and using the services provided herein, you unconditionally agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service. You agree to abide by the terms governing the use of this website and its services, which also govern all information provided by you and other users of InfiGate.

If you do not agree with all or any part of this Privacy Policy, please do not use this website.

policy_3.title: PAYMENT POLICY
policy_3.content-1:
You can purchase directly on InfiGate.vn in 3 steps:

  1. Visit https://InfiGate.vn/ and select the country you need an eSIM for.

  2. Choose the appropriate eSIM and click Buy.

  3. Pay and receive the eSIM QR code via email with detailed installation instructions.
policy_3.content-2:
• Account number: 626668998

  • Account name: WellZone Technology Solutions JSC

  • Bank: Military Commercial Joint Stock Bank (MB Bank), Transaction Office 1 Branch

policy_4.title: DELIVERY POLICY
policy_4.title-outSide-1: For InfiGate’s eSIM products, after the customer places an order and successfully completes payment via bank transfer, InfiGate will send the eSIM to the customer’s registered email no later than 2 hours after the order is placed.
policy_4.title-outSide-2: In the event of a delay in delivery or service provision, InfiGate will promptly inform the customer and provide the option to cancel the order if desired.
policy_4.title-outSide-3: As the eSIM is delivered via email, please ensure you provide the correct email address to receive the eSIM in a timely manner. If you do not receive any email from InfiGate within 15 minutes after placing your order, please contact InfiGate’s customer service via email at info@infigate.global or hotline/Whatsapp: +84989145663 for immediate assistance.

policy_5.title: RETURN AND REFUND POLICY
policy_5.title-outSide-1: To ensure customer benefits and provide peace of mind when purchasing a travel eSIM from InfiGate, we offer “Exchange – Return” policies in cases where customers receive an incorrect product or when issues arise due to InfiGate’s fault.
policy_5.content-1:
If the customer receives an eSIM that does not match the type ordered, InfiGate commits to assisting with an exchange within 01 day.
If a customer wishes to switch to a different type of eSIM after a successful purchase, please contact the company via hotline/Whatsapp +84989145663. With approval, the customer may exchange for another SIM number.
policy_5.content-2:
Customers may return the eSIM and receive a refund if, during the purchase process, any of the following occurs:

  • The eSIM type is not as ordered.
  • Complaints, disputes, or other issues arise due to InfiGate.
  • The customer has completed payment but InfiGate cannot provide the requested eSIM. In this case, 100% of the paid amount will be refunded at the earliest possible time.
  • Refund processing time: within a maximum of 7 working days after we confirm the issue.
  • Please note: shipping fees are non-refundable.

InfiGate will provide the fastest possible support for our customers!
policy_5.content-3:
• eSIM warranty period: 15 days from the date of successful purchase. Applicable in cases where the eSIM cannot be installed or experiences errors during use.
    eSIM re-issuance policy: In the event of a phone malfunction or loss, please contact InfiGate’s customer service via email at info@infigate.global or Hotline/WhatsApp: +84989145663 for timely assistance. The re-issuance fee is VND 25,000.
  • eSIM activation period: within 15 days from the date of successful purchase.

guide.question-0: What to prepare before installing your eSIM?
guide.question-1: How do I check if my Android device supports eSIM?
guide.question-2: How do I check if my iOS device supports eSIM?
guide.question-3: How do I install and set up an eSIM on my Android device?
guide.question-4: How do I install and set up an eSIM on my iOS device?
guide.answer-0:
Installing an eSIM on compatible devices (iPhone, Samsung, Google Pixel, etc.) is simple and quick. After completing your purchase, you will receive an email from the provider containing your eSIM information and detailed installation instructions.

The entire eSIM installation and activation process is done online 100% and only takes about 3–5 minutes.

📌 What to prepare before installing your eSIM?

  1. eSIM-compatible device
    Make sure your device is compatible with eSIM technology. Check our list of eSIM-supported devices to see if your device works with eSIM.
  2. Email in use
    Your provider will send you a QR code containing your eSIM and other information (SM-DP+ Address and Activation Code for manual installation) to the email address you provided.
  3. WiFi
    Ensure your device is connected to a stable WiFi network to proceed with the installation and activation of your eSIM.
Tip: Print your QR code or write down the activation code for manual entry if you only have one phone. You can use another device to take a picture of the QR code and scan it. In particular, iOS 17 allows you to scan a QR code directly from your Photo Album.
guide.answer-1:
Whether a device is eSIM-compatible depends on whether the manufacturer includes an eSIM in their devices. That is why we have a list of eSIM-compatible devices for easy checking.

However, there are some cases when a device doesn't support eSIM technology, even if it is listed as eSIM-capable.

Android is an open-source operating system, meaning any mobile device manufacturer or carrier can customize it. In some countries and regions, there may be models released without eSIM capability. Or the carrier you purchased your device from may not have an eSIM feature enabled.

Follow the steps below to check if your Android device supports eSIM technology. Please keep in mind the steps may or may not be applicable to your device. The best way to confirm eSIM capability is still through your device manufacturer, vendor, or primary carrier.

For Samsung Galaxy devices:

  1. OPEN the Settings app, then TAP Connections.
  2. TAP SIM Manager.
  3. If Add eSIM is available, your device likely supports eSIMs.
  4. Remember to contact your provider or device manufacturer to confirm if the above steps are possible for your device.

For Google Pixel devices:

  1. OPEN the Settings app, then TAP Network & Internet.
  2. TAP the + sign beside SIMs.
  3. If the Connect to mobile network page has a "Download a SIM instead?" option, your device is eSIM-capable.
  4. Remember to contact your provider or device manufacturer to confirm if the above steps are possible for your device.

For other Android devices:

  1. DIAL *#06# and press the call button.
  2. If your device is eSIM-compatible, you should be able to view your device's eSIM unique identification number (EID).

Your device also must be carrier-unlocked to use an eSIM. This enables you to use multiple SIM and/or eSIMs from different carriers. Follow these steps to check if your Android device is unlocked:

  1. Remove your phone's SIM card.
  2. Replace the SIM card with another SIM card from a different carrier.
  3. You can now see that the carrier's name at the top of your home screen has changed.
  4. Now dial a call.

If the call connects, your phone is unlocked. If you can't make a call right now, the phone is locked to the first carrier. At this moment, you may also see a notice on the screen saying that the phone is locked.

Remember to check with your device manufacturer, vendor, or primary carrier to confirm eSIM capability if you're still unsure.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact our support team, and we'll be happy to help!
guide.answer-2:
Whether a device is eSIM-compatible depends on whether the manufacturer includes an eSIM. That's why we have a list of eSIM-compatible devices for easy checking.

In some countries and regions, there may be models released without eSIM capability. Or, the carrier you purchased your device from may not have an eSIM feature enabled.

Follow the steps below to check if your iOS device supports eSIM technology. Please remember that the steps may or may not apply to your device. The best way to confirm eSIM capability is still through your device manufacturer, vendor, or primary carrier.

For iPhone:

  1. OPEN the Settings app, then TAP General.
  2. TAP About.
  3. TAP the Model Number until it changes to an AXXXX combination.
  4. VERIFY that the Model Number of your iPhone does not originate from a Chinese region. The information can be found in this link.
  5. If the model number does not match any of the China mainland, Hong Kong, and Macao devices, your device should be eSIM-compatible. Next, find out if your iPhone is carrier-locked or -unlocked by following the steps below.
  1. OPEN the Settings app, then TAP General.
  2. TAP About.
  3. SCROLL and look for the Carrier Lock field. Your iPhone is unlocked if No SIM restrictions appear next to Carrier Lock.

For iPad:

  1. OPEN the Settings app, then TAP General.
  2. TAP About.
  3. TAP the Model Number until it changes to an AXXXX combination.
  4. VERIFY that the Model Number of your iPad does not originate from a Chinese region. The information can be found in this link.
  5. If the model number does not match any of the China mainland, Hong Kong, and Macao variants, your device should be eSIM-compatible as long as it supports cellular functionality.

Remember to check with your device manufacturer, vendor, or primary carrier to confirm eSIM capability if you're still unsure.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact our support team, and we'll be happy to help!
guide.answer-3:
First of all, you must check the following items in order to guarantee that you are able to successfully install and set up your eSIM:

  • Your device needs to be eSIM compatible and network unlocked. (see "What devices support eSIM?" + "How do I check if my Android device supports eSIM?")
  • You have a stable connection, preferably WiFi. (You need to download the eSIM properly to your device and a stable internet connection is a must.)

Depending on the eSIM you purchase, there are multiple ways to add an eSIM to your device:

  1. Directly installing from the Infigate app — this is the easiest method, but not always available
  2. Scanning the QR Code from the "QR code" tab
  3. Adding the installation details manually from the "Manual" tab

I. PREPARATION

  1. Login to your Infigate account.
  2. Go to My eSIMs.
  3. Look for the eSIM you want to install.
  4. Tap the Details button.
  5. Tap Install eSIM/Access Data
  6. Select which type of installation: Tap the QR Code or Manual Installation. Please print the code or use a different device to display the QR code.

II. INSTALLATION

Option 1: By scanning the QR code

  1. Choose the "QR Code" tab at the top (You may select the share QR button for sharing it with another device).
  2. Go to Settings on your device.
  3. Tap on Network & Internet.
  4. Tap the Add or + icon next to Mobile Network.
  5. Tap Next when asked, “Don’t have a SIM card?”
  6. Scan your QR code and add the confirmation code if prompted.
  7. Go back to your "Install eSIM/Access Data" screen.
  8. Turn on eSIM under Mobile Network.
  9. Enable Mobile Data.
  10. Enable Data Roaming (Please turn off your primary line to avoid roaming charges from your carrier provider when overseas).
  11. Go to Network & Internet and tap on the Mobile network to set the correct network preferences listed in the Additional Info which is at the bottom-right of the selected data package page.
  12. Set up an APN (access point name) on your device if required.

Option 2: By adding the details manually

If you are experiencing issues scanning the QR code or are unable to scan the QR code, you can enter eSIM details manually. Please follow these steps:

  1. Choose the "Manual" tab at the top.
  2. Copy the "SM-DP+Address & Activation Code" (manual installation information).
  3. Tap on Network & Internet.
  4. Tap the Add or + icon next to Mobile Network.
  5. Tap Next when asked, “Don’t have a SIM card?”
  6. Tap Enter Code Manually. You will be asked to enter your SM-DP+Address as shared on your eSIM installation page.
  7. Turn on your eSIM under Mobile Network.
  8. Enable Mobile Data.
  9. Enable Data Roaming (Please turn off your primary line to avoid roaming charges from your carrier provider when overseas).
  10. Set up an APN (access point name) on your device if required.

Important Tip

Once the eSIM has been installed either via QR code or Manual method, you can easily complete the steps for accessing data through the shortcuts to your device's screens by tapping the "SETTINGS" buttons from your "Access data steps".

If you need any assistance, please feel free to contact us.
guide.answer-4:
Please check the following items in order to guarantee that you are able to successfully install and set up your eSIM:

  • Your device is eSIM compatible and network unlocked. (see "What devices support eSIM?" + "How do I check if my iOS device supports eSIM?")
  • You have a stable connection, preferably WiFi. (You need to download the eSIM properly to your device and a stable internet connection is a must.)

You can find the step-by-step instructions below, but you may also find our iOS installation video guide helpful.

There are three ways of installing an eSIM on your device:

  • Direct method
  • QR Code method
  • Manual method

This article will guide you through both QR code and Manual methods.

I. PREPARATION

  1. Login to your Infigate account.
  2. Go to My eSIMs.
  3. Look for the eSIM you want to install.
  4. Tap the Details button.
  5. Tap Install eSIM/Access Data.
  6. Tap the Manual tab at the top.
  7. You should be able to see SM-DP+ Address & Activation code. Take note of this or keep this page open so you can copy the details later.

II. INSTALLATION

Manual Method

  1. On your device, go to Settings.
  2. Tap Cellular or Mobile.
  3. Tap Add Cellular Plan or Add Mobile Data Plan.
  4. Select Enter Details Manually. You will be asked to enter:
    • SM-DP+ Address
    • Activation Code
    • Confirmation Code (if available on your Infigate Account)
  5. Choose a label or customized label for your eSIM.
  6. Under the Default Line page, select your eSIM for cellular data only.
  7. You should see your new eSIM under your Cellular Data or Mobile Data Plans.

QR Code Method

  1. On your device, go to Settings.
  2. Tap Cellular or Mobile.
  3. Tap Add Cellular Plan or Add Mobile Data Plan.
  4. Use your printed QR code or another device that displays the QR code to scan your eSIM QR Code.
  5. If prompted, enter the 4-digit confirmation code. You can skip this step if you are not provided with the confirmation code.
  6. Choose a label or customized label for your eSIM.
  7. Under the Default Line page, select your eSIM for cellular data only.
  8. You should see your new eSIM under your Cellular Data or Mobile Data Plans.

IV. ACCESSING DATA (QR Code or Manual Method)

After installing your eSIM, you must also make the necessary adjustments for connecting as required on your eSIM installation page.

  1. On your device, go to Settings > Cellular or Settings > Mobile.
  2. Tap on your newly installed eSIM plan.
  3. Toggle TURN ON THIS LINE for your eSIM and enable Data Roaming.
  4. On the same page, tap on Cellular Data Network or Mobile Data Network. Type the APN (access point name) on the field provided on your device if required. You can find the APN details in the eSIM installation details on your Infigate App/Account.
  5. Go back to Settings > Cellular or Settings > Mobile.
  6. Select your eSIM for Cellular Data or Mobile Data. Be sure to turn OFF "Allow Cellular Data Switching" to avoid charges on your other line.
  7. Go to your eSIM settings and select the supported network.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact support.

• If you're setting up your device after June 23, 2020, your eSIM will activate after installation — contact your carrier if you don't have eSIM enabled.
• For devices set up before June 23, 2020, follow the steps in this link to activate your eSIM. The procedure may require you to erase your device's data – please make sure you back up your device beforehand.

*Only iPad devices with Wi-Fi + Cellular features are supported.

  • Galaxy S25 Slim
  • Galaxy S25 Ultra
  • Galaxy Fold

*The following Samsung Galaxy devices DO NOT have eSIM capability:
• All Galaxy devices originating from China, Hong Kong, and Taiwan.
• All Galaxy FE "Fan Edition" models, except the Galaxy S23 FE and S24 FE.
• USA models of the Galaxy S20, S21*, and Note 20 Ultra.

*Most Samsung Galaxy devices purchased in South Korea do not support eSIMs, except for the Galaxy S24, S23, Z Fold 5, Z Fold 4, Z Flip 5, Z Flip 4, and A54 5G variants.

*Surface: Any AT&T-locked devices will not support eSIMs. If your device was purchased through another carrier, the carrier may have disabled eSIM capability in the Surface Duo. Please contact the carrier to confirm.

order.scanQr: Scan the QR code to activate
order.pressShowQr: Press Show QR Code to reveal it again

installGuide.title-1: Choose country & package according to your needs
installGuide.title-3: Receive eSIM QR email to registration mail or receive in "My eSIM" section on the application
installGuide.title-4: Open the camera on the phone to scan the eSIM QR code and add the eSIM to the device or click "Link to install/Install now" on the application
installGuide.des-4: Note: make sure there is wifi during the eSIM code scanning process
installGuide.title-5: Click next steps to complete the setup
